nodes.text: Merr-Sonn is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on April 29, 2004 and described two smugglers, Drossh and Rezzo, examining the cargo they had been smuggling. After a disagreement between the two, they accidentally exploded the munitions they were carrying, resulting in their own deaths. In the context of the Living Force campaign, from this incident onwards, player-characters had access to items in the Arms & Equipment Guide.
